info.title: CozyCave.ch API Documentation
info.description:
This is the REST API documentation for the backend of cozycave.ch.

For all endpoints: if something is required, the you have to send it on POST, if something is explicitly non-required you don't have to set it at all but if somewhere the required require statement is not set, it may be required to e.g. publish the entity but not necessary for POST. Please see description then.
Sending a PUT endpoint usually doesn't require any property, if otherwise, it's marked on the description of the object.

(auto set) := set by the server automatically even when not send.

bearerAuth.description: JWT Authorization header using the Bearer scheme. Example: "Authorization: Bearer {token}"

message.example: used a teapot instead of a coffeepot

path.description: path of the request that caused the error

biography.example: I am a very nice person

UserPostPut.description: User object used to create or update a user

token.description: JWT token when the user registering or logging in

UserDetails.description: User details object (note: birthday must be today 16 years ago)

biography.example: I am a very nice person

picture.description: Fallback profile picture is always the Gravatar Picture

ListingGet.description: Listing object (if published is set, following fields must be set on the listing: title, description, address, listing_type, available_to, available(auto set), publisher(auto set))

description.example: beautiful apartment in Zurich with one bedroom and a balcony

available.description: if the listing is still available or not

rooms.description: number of rooms of the listing

pictures.description: pictures of a listing in a list

floorplan.description: pictures of the floorplans to a listing in a list

ListingPostPut.description: Listing object used to create or update a listing (if published is set, following fields must be set on the listing: title, description, address, listing_type, available_to, available(auto set), publisher(auto set))

description.example: beautiful apartment in Zurich with one bedroom and a balcony

available.description: if the listing is still available or not

rooms.description: number of rooms of the listing

pictures.description: pictures of a listing in a list

floorplan.description: pictures of the floorplans to a listing in a list

ApplicationGet.description: Application object used to create or update an Application

ApplicationPostPut.description: Application object used to create or update an Application

ListingType.description: value must be in all upper case

Gender.description: value must be in all upper case

ApplicationStatus.description: value must be in all upper case

Role.description: value must be in all upper case

Picture_url.description: Direct Link to where picture is stored / can be retrieved

UnauthorizedError.description: The request does not have valid authentication credentials for the target resource.

ForbiddenError.description: The authenticated user doesn't have the necessary permissions for the action.

BadRequestError.description: The request is malformed, could not be parsed, misses information or includes invalid data.

InternalServerError.description: The server encountered an unexpected condition which prevented it from fulfilling the request.

MethodNotAllowedError.description: The method is not allowed for the requested URL.

ConflictError.description: The request could not be completed due to a conflict with the current state of the target resource. This might be due to an already existing resource with the same unique fields.

NoContent.description: The request was successful but the response body is empty.

UserId.name: userId
UserId.description: The unique identifier of the user.

ListingId.name: listingId
ListingId.description: The unique identifier of the listing.

ApplicationId.name: applicationId
ApplicationId.description: The unique identifier of an application.

PictureId.name: PictureId
PictureId.description: The unique identifier of a picture.

tags.name: authentication
tags.description: Authentication operations used for user authentication like registering, logging in and logging out.

tags.name: users
tags.description: User operations used for managing users.

tags.name: listings
tags.description: Listing operations used for managing listings.

tags.name: applications
tags.description: Application operations used for managing applications for listings.

tags.name: pictures
tags.description: Picture operations used for uploading pictures for profile pictures as well as listing pictures.

tags.name: default
tags.description: Default operations used for handling unknown requests.

get.description:
Returns a simple message to verify that the server is up and running.

Permitted Roles

  • ANONYMOUS
  • LANDLORD
  • STUDENT
  • TEAM
  • ADMIN

post.description:
registers and logs in a new user (token provided in the response)

Permitted Roles

  • ANONYMOUS
  • LANDLORD
  • STUDENT
  • TEAM
  • ADMIN

put.description:
used to log in as an already registered user (token is provided in response)

Permitted Roles

  • ANONYMOUS
  • LANDLORD
  • STUDENT
  • TEAM
  • ADMIN

post.description:
creates a new user by a team member (doesn't include token when created)

Permitted Roles

  • TEAM (only users below team role)
  • ADMIN

get.description:
retrieves a user by id

Permitted Roles

  • LANDLORD (only on self)
  • STUDENT (only on self)
  • TEAM
  • ADMIN

put.description:
updates a user by id

Permitted Roles

  • LANDLORD (only on self)
  • STUDENT (only on self)
  • TEAM
  • ADMIN

delete.description:
deletes a user by id

Permitted Roles

  • ADMIN

get.summary: list all applications of a user
get.description:
lists all applications of a user

Permitted Roles

  • LANDLORD (only on self)
  • STUDENT (only on self)
  • TEAM
  • ADMIN

get.summary: get a specific application of a user
get.description:
gets a specific application of a user

Permitted Roles

  • LANDLORD (only on self)
  • STUDENT (only on self)
  • TEAM
  • ADMIN

delete.summary: delete an application of a user
delete.description:
deletes an application of a user

Permitted Roles

  • LANDLORD (only on self)
  • STUDENT (only on self)
  • TEAM
  • ADMIN

put.description:
updates a listing

Permitted Roles

  • LANDLORD (only on own listings)
  • STUDENT (only on own listings)
  • TEAM
  • ADMIN

delete.description:
deletes a listing

Permitted Roles

  • LANDLORD (only on own listings)
  • STUDENT (only on own listings)
  • TEAM
  • ADMIN

get.summary: returns all applications on a specific listing
get.description:
returns all applications on a specific listing

Permitted Roles

  • LANDLORD (only on own listings)
  • TEAM
  • ADMIN

post.summary: creates a new application to a listing
post.description:
creates a new application on a specific listing

Permitted Roles

  • STUDENT
  • TEAM
  • ADMIN

get.summary: returns a specific application on a listing
get.description:
students can only access their own application

Permitted Roles

  • LANDLORD (only on own listing)
  • STUDENT (only on own application)
  • TEAM
  • ADMIN

put.description:
updates the status of an application
once an application has been approved, all other applications for the listing will be denied.

Permitted Roles

  • LANDLORD (only on own listing)
  • TEAM
  • ADMIN

delete.description:
deletes an application on a specific listing

Permitted Roles

  • STUDENT (only on own application)
  • LANDLORD (only on own listing)
  • TEAM
  • ADMIN

get.summary: retrieves a list of all pictures, either profile or listing
get.description:
retrieves a list of pictures

Permitted Roles

  • ADMIN

get.summary: retrieves a specific picture, either profile or listing
get.description:
retrieves a single picture by id

Permitted Roles

  • ANONYMOUS
  • LANDLORD
  • STUDENT
  • TEAM
  • ADMIN

delete.description:
deletes a specific picture by id

Permitted Roles

  • STUDENT (only for it's own profile picture)
  • LANDLORD (only for it's own listing pictures)
  • ADMIN

get.summary: retrieves the url of a picture
get.description:
retrieves a single url of a picture

Permitted Roles

  • ANONYMOUS
  • LANDLORD
  • STUDENT
  • TEAM
  • ADMIN

retrieves a single picture by the id of the user

Permitted Roles

  • ANONYMOUS
  • LANDLORD
  • STUDENT
  • TEAM
  • ADMIN

post.description:
uploads a single picture to the profile of the authenticated user

Permitted Roles

  • LANDLORD (only for own profile)
  • STUDENT (only for own profile)
  • ADMIN

The fallback profile picture, or when none is defined when creating a user, it always uses the Gravatar picture

get.summary: retrieves a list of pictures for a specific listing
get.description:
retrieves a list of pictures by the id of the listing

Permitted Roles

  • ANONYMOUS
  • LANDLORD
  • STUDENT
  • TEAM
  • ADMIN

post.summary: uploads a picture to a listing
post.description:
uploads a single picture to a listing

Permitted Roles

  • LANDLORD (only for own profile)

get.summary: retrieves a list of pictures of floorplans for a specific listing
get.description:
retrieves a list of pictures by the id of the listing

Permitted Roles

  • ANONYMOUS
  • LANDLORD
  • STUDENT
  • TEAM
  • ADMIN

post.summary: uploads a floorplan picture to a listing
post.description:
uploads a single floorplan picture to a listing

Permitted Roles

  • LANDLORD (only for own profile)
